Ad Text:
Our Fin serviced client is looking for a talented Solution Architect to join our team, serving as the primary driver of our architectural strategy across traditional applications, LLMs, and AI.

In this role you’ll be the last line of defence, making sure all applications are secure by design.

Understand the Landscape: Gain a full view of our tech and app ecosystem and assess it for security risks.
Lead Security Efforts: Provide hands-on cybersecurity guidance in Agile teams across Digital.
Embed Best Practice: Build and integrate strong security processes into the SDLC for all teams.
Design Secure Architectures: Plan and develop robust, scalable security patterns for projects.
Manage Vulnerabilities: Proactively find, prioritise, and remediate issues across code and infrastructure.
Automate Security: Integrate SAST, DAST, and other checks into CI/CD pipelines for early detection.
Secure AI Systems: Address unique risks in LLMs and Gen AI such as prompt injection and data poisoning.
Run Assessments: Lead regular scans, risk analyses, and security reviews; share findings with product teams.
Educate Teams: Research standards and protocols, then coach developers on secure practices.
Align with Policy: Work with Cyber Security and the business to apply policies, log risks, and maintain compliance.
Respond to Incidents: Act fast on threats, manage escalations, and deliver post-incident reports.
Partner with Vendors: Help select and implement security tools and solutions.
Promote Awareness: Drive security training and education programs for developers and digital teams.
About YOU

You’re a results-driven security professional with strong expertise in both application and cloud security. You have:

Experience: Proven track record as an Application Security Engineer or similar role.
Technical Skills: In-depth knowledge of web and cloud vulnerabilities (e.g., OWASP Top 10) and hands-on experience with security testing tools and methodologies.
Cloud Security: Strong experience with GCP, including IAM, network security, and data protection.
Problem-Solving: Analytical and proactive in identifying and mitigating complex security threats.
Communication: Excellent interpersonal skills, able to influence and collaborate with engineering teams across the organization.
Please contact kate@correlateresources.com if you are interested in this role!

Job Title: Senior AI / Machine Learning Engineer – Leading Finance Organization
Salary: Great Salary plus a bonus of up to 15% on top
Ad Text:
Join a fast-moving financial services organisation as a Senior AI / Machine Learning Engineer, where you’ll design and deliver advanced AI systems that create meaningful impact across digital experiences, customer touchpoints, fraud detection, and operational automation.


You’ll work alongside talented Engineers and Data Scientists to shape and deliver AI-driven solutions that enhance customer experience, digital channels, and operational efficiency — delivering tangible, measurable outcomes for the business.

Why Join?

Award Winning Finance Organization, with a supportive culture
Clear career development plans to support your continual growth
Collaborative, forward-thinking culture with genuine career acceleration
Innovative, passionate team that values technical excellence and continuous learning
Hybrid and flexible working arrangements

Technical Experience

Strong Python (async, production-grade), PyTorch, TensorFlow
GenAI and NLP: LLM fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI
Microservices, REST APIs, event-driven systems
Hands-on experience with Generative and Agentic AI projects

Bonus Skills

Experience applying Generative and Agentic AI to voice recognition, digital CX automation, call deflection, or intelligent routing
Real-time NLP, voice-to-text, and CRM or customer journey integrations

If you’re ready to build AI systems that redefine how customers engage across digital channels, we’d love to hear from you.
Interviews happening next week.
For a confidential discussion, text Anna-Maria on 0426 503 822 and I will get back to you.
